title: Decent place to work
text: Pros Had great health benefits and 401k Cons Didn’t receive promotion or raise that I was promised Advice to Management Keep your word
cons: Didn’t receive promotion or raise that I was promised

title: Awesome company absolutely taking off right now!
text: Pros - Best technical team. - Awesome project. - Awesome mission. - Awesome technical leadership. - Cool technical stack. - Fast paced and good for personal development. - Friendly and caring team and management. - Exciting time to work here. - Rewarding. Cons - Chaotic - Technical specs could be better but it's understandable and new product processes are already being rolled out. - Lot's of founder pressure at the moment.

title: A Rocket Ship!
text: Pros An amazing environment! A company striving to make a real change in the world. Very bright people who work hard and believe in the art of the possible. An inspirational startup /scale-up environment. Really cool office and company brownie's on Friday's. Cons Not for the fainthearted and a little cult like - if that not your thing probably not a fit. Fast growing with the atypical issues that this causes. Advice to Management Don't forget to celebrate the journey and the office dog, Winks, should be a permanent 5 day a week presence.
pros: An amazing environment! A company striving to make a real change in the world. Very bright people who work hard and believe in the art of the possible. An inspirational startup /scale-up environment. Really cool office and company brownie's on Friday's.
cons: Not for the fainthearted and a little cult like - if that not your thing probably not a fit. Fast growing with the atypical issues that this causes.
advice: Don't forget to celebrate the journey and the office dog, Winks, should be a permanent 5 day a week presence.

title: Wouldn't recommend it
text: Pros Interesting, small, tech-focused and insights into different areas of business Cons Staff treated badly, no structure, bad pay, no communication
pros: Interesting, small, tech-focused and insights into different areas of business
cons: Staff treated badly, no structure, bad pay, no communication

title: Great start-up to work in
text: Pros - Amazing leadership team caring about individuals' aspirations and helping the team grow through day to day responsibilities - Great team culture with a healthy balance between friendliness and strong work ethic - Open and supportive team members - it's very easy to become friends - Inspiring company's mission - the work is fulfilling - Unique opportunity to learn in practice about entrepreneurship, start-ups and scaling up - Getting real responsibility to add value to the company Cons None that I can think of.
pros: - Amazing leadership team caring about individuals' aspirations and helping the team grow through day to day responsibilities
cons: None that I can think of.

title: Brand Ambassador
text: Pros Working hours are completely flexible. You try to find new potential 'sign ups' whenever you can/want! Cons Couldn't name one. Perhaps feeling a bit closer to the founders of the App?
pros: Working hours are completely flexible. You try to find new potential 'sign ups' whenever you can/want!
cons: Couldn't name one. Perhaps feeling a bit closer to the founders of the App?
